pages.text: To begin your quest to cast powerful spells, take note of the steps within this guide. Spell casting will involve crafting, imbuing, exploring, and the perseverance to upgrade your scepters to unlock even more powerful magics.$(br2)Before you begin, you will need to craft an $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$().

With that accomplished, your path to spell mastery begins as follows... $(li)Imbue or obtain an $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/opal)Opal$()$(li)Craft an $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/opaline_scepter)Opaline Scepter$()$(li)Imbue your scepter with an augment (there are several recorded within this tome).$(li)If you do not have the resources for that at the moment, scepters can naturally perform a magic missile attack.$(li)For more powerful spells find tomes scattered around the world $(li)Cast your spell, and find and add more augments!

Now that you have a functioning scepter, there is some more you should know...$(br2)$(l)Mana: $()Scepters have a limit to the magical energy they can expend at one time. More powerful scepters have higher limits. A blue bar in the item hotbar denotes the remaining scepter mana. If your scepter runs low, you can quaff a $(#b0b)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/mana_potion)Mana Potion$() to restore its vigor.
